def ${1:fname}(${2:`if [ "$TM_CURRENT_LINE" != "" ]
				# poor man's way ... check if there is an indent or not
				# (cuz we would have lost the class scope by this point)
				then
					echo "self"
				fi`}):
	${3/.+/"""/}${3:docstring for $1}${3/.+/"""\n/}${3/.+/\t/}${0:pass}
name: New Function
